grid.sql: WITH rekv_ids AS ( SELECT rekv_id FROM get_asutuse_struktuur($2) WHERE rekv_id = CASE WHEN $3 = 1 THEN rekv_id ELSE $2 END) SELECT coalesce((SELECT sum(summa) FROM docs.pv_oper po WHERE po.pv_kaart_id = p.id AND po.kpv <= $1::DATE AND liik = 2), 0) + p.algkulum AS arv_kulum, coalesce((SELECT sum(summa) FROM docs.pv_oper po WHERE po.pv_kaart_id = p.id AND liik IN (1, 3)), 0) AS soetmaks, (SELECT eluiga FROM libs.get_pv_kaart_jaak(p.id::INTEGER, $1::DATE))::NUMERIC(12,4) AS eluiga, p.*, r.nimetus as asutus FROM cur_pohivara p inner join ou.rekv r on r.id = p.rekvid WHERE (p.mahakantud IS NULL or p.mahakantud > $1) AND p.rekvid IN (SELECT rekv_id FROM rekv_ids)
